name: Cave Escape (itch) (refractionpcsx2)
description:
Story:

You've been exploring deep inside an interesting cave, until you hear a rumbling noise and notice the roof is starting to collapse. You need to run for your life and get the hell out of there before the roof caves in!

This game is a fast paced edge-of-your-seat 2D platformer, you'll be avoiding obstacles and trying to outrun the roof collapsing above you!

Controls:

A & D or Q & D (AZERTY Keyboards) or Left/Right Arrows: Move Left or Right.

J or Space: Jump
